Article Title: Chandigarh woman loses Rs 80 lakh to SIM card scam: Here‚Äôs what happened
Article Text:
How the scam unfolded?

How to check SIM cards registered on your Aadhaar Card?

Visit the TAFCOP website: https://tafcop.sancharsaathi.gov.in/telecomUser/

Enter your Mobile number in the given box

Next, enter the captcha and click on ‚Äúrequest OTP.‚Äù

Enter the OTP you have received on your number and click on ‚ÄúLogin.‚Äù

You will see a list of mobile numbers registered on your ID.

Check and ensure that all the active mobile numbers belong to you or to your relatives

In case of any doubt, this website gives 03 options; ‚ÄúNot my number‚Äù, ‚ÄúNot required‚Äù and ‚ÄúRequired‚Äù.

You can report a number that is registered with your ID and does not belong to any of your family members by clicking ‚ÄúNot my number‚Äù.

A Chandigarh resident lost Rs 80 lakh after she received a call from fraudsters posing as a police officer. The caller told her that a SIM card in her name was allegedly being used in illegal activities. The victim, fearing arrest, agreed to the caller‚Äôs demand and transferred the money, reports Tribune India.A case has been registered with the cybercrime police station.The victim is a resident of sector 11, Chandigarh. She told police that she received a call from a person who pretended to be a police officer with the Crime Branch in Mumbai. The caller told her that a SIM card issued against her Aadhaar card was used in illegal money laundering activities.The fraudster asserted that they have received 24 money laundering complaints against her, further threatening her with an arrest. Fearing arrest, the victim followed the caller‚Äôs direction who demanded Rs 80 lakh which was to be returned if the woman was found innocent.The woman eventually transferred Rs 80 lakh to ‚Äòclear the case‚Äô, only to realize later that she had been scammed.The Department of Telecommunication (DoT) launched a web portal called Telecom Analytics for Fraud Management & Consumer Protection or TAFCOP to check SIM cards issued under one ID. Here‚Äôs how to do it
Article Summary: A Chandigarh resident lost Rs 80 lakh after she received a call from fraudsters posing as a police officer. The caller told her that a SIM card in her name was allegedly being used in illegal activities. The victim, fearing arrest, agreed to the caller‚Äôs demand and transferred the money.

Article Title: How Nvidia may have helped TSMC reach $1 trillion market capitalisation
Article Text:
What TSMC CEO said about Nvidia‚Äôs rise

Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company , or TSMC , recently surpassed $1 trillion in market capitalisation after Morgan Stanley analysts boosted price targets on the chipmaker before its earnings next week. The Taiwanese chipmaker overtook Berkshire Hathaway earlier in June to become the world‚Äôs eighth most valuable company, based on its ADRs.A report by Business Insider pointed out that an increase in demand of Nvidia‚Äôs AI chips helped the Apple chip supplier to touch this milestone.This comes about a month after reports said that TSMC is planning to charge more from Nvidia which has reaped the benefits of the recent Al boom, making it one of the world's most valuable companies after Microsoft and Apple.TSMC is the sole production partner for Nvidia's most advanced Al training chips, including its latest Blackwell line. As per the data by CitiGroup , nearly 90% of the world's most advanced processor chips are produced by the Taiwanese major.TSMC CEO CC Wei told reporters that he talked to Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang about expensive chips.‚ÄúI did complain to Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang -- the 'three trillion guy' -- that his products are so expensive. I think those products are really valuable for sure, but I am thinking about showing [him] our values as well. Anyone sitting at home can think [up this strategy],‚Äù he said.During TSMC's first-quarter earnings call in April, the CEO said that the company is planning to charge customers more if they want their chips made outside Taiwan. ‚ÄúWe expect our customers to share some of the higher cost with us, and we [have] already started our discussion with our customers,‚Äù he said.Not only TSMC, Dutch company ASML , the equipment supplier to the Taiwanese chipmaker, is also reaping the benefits of Nvidia's meteoric rise. Its shares also got a boost, briefly crossing 1,000 euros, or $1,082, apiece for the first time this week.
Article Summary: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company recently surpassed $1 trillion in market capitalisation. Morgan Stanley analysts boosted price targets on the chipmaker before its earnings next week. The Taiwanese chipmaker overtook Berkshire Hathaway earlier in June to become the world‚Äôs eighth most valuable company.

Article Title: Google Maps on iPhones is getting this feature 5 years after its launch on Android
Article Text:
What are speedometer and speed limits features

How to turn speedometer and speed limits features on

On an Android phone or iPhone, open the Google Maps app.

Tap profile picture or initial Account Circle

Tap on Settings and then open Navigation settings.

Under ‚ÄúDriving options,‚Äù turn on/off the Speedometer.

Google Maps is bringing two features to iPhones: speedometer and speed limits. These features were launched on Android in May 2019 in over 40 countries, including India. Both of these are also making their way to CarPlay and will help iPhone users avoid speed ticketing.The feature was first spotted by TechCrunch in India and Google later confirmed to the publication that it will be rolling out to iPhones users globally.Speedometer feature allows users to check their speed in Google Maps. However, Google notes that Speedometers shown in the app are for informational use only and users must make sure ‚Äúto use your vehicles' speedometer to confirm your actual driving speed.‚ÄùMeanwhile, Speed Limit alerts will let users know if they are driving too fast. The speed indicator will change colours if users go over the speed limit.‚ÄúExternal factors may cause the Maps Speedometer to differ from your actual speed,‚Äù Google notedUsers can turn on or off the speedometer and speed limits on supported devices and markets.If the Speed Limits feature is available in your location, you can turn the speedometer on or off by tapping Speed Limit during navigation.The feature was initially present in Google‚Äôs navigation app, Waze before coming to Google Maps. Apart from speeds, Google Maps also shows speed cameras and mobile speed cameras in several countries worldwide.
Article Summary: Google Maps is bringing two features to iPhones: speedometer and speed limits. These features were launched on Android in May 2019 in over 40 countries, including India. Both of these are also making their way to CarPlay and will help iPhone users avoid speed ticketing.

Article Title: Why Lucknow SuperGiants 'shared' this Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma photo with Elon Musk
Article Text:
What Virat Kohli told PM Modi

Lucknow SuperGiants official X, formerly known as Twitter, account recently replied to a post from Tesla CEO and X owner Elon Musk . In a post on X, Musk asked users to share beautiful content. Lucknow Super Giant's social media account replied to the same with a picture from the recent ICC T20 World Cup final, which was played between Indian and South Africa.The Indian team beat South Africa by 7-run to win the World Cup, which ended India's 13-year-long wait for an ICC World Cup trophy."Would be lovely to see more accounts on ùïè simply posting beautiful content x.com/evalovesdesign‚Ä¶," wrote Musk. Quoting this Elon Musk post, Lucknow SuperGiants replied, "Okay done ü•∞," and along with these words shared the picture of Indian cricket team captain Rohit Sharma hugging star batsman Virat Kohli .These pictures of Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma hugging are said to have broken the internet. The pictures shared on various social media platforms including X, Instagram and Facebook have got millions of likes.Talking about the hug at the felicitation ceremony, Kohli said "We have been playing for the last 15 years, this is the first time, I see Rohit so emotional - he was crying, I was crying, a hug between both of us - I will never forget that day." The felicitation function was organised by the BCCI at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai.Kohli said that winning the T20 World Cup 2024 was a special moment for him as he had not realised the gravity of the moment when he was part of M.S Dhoni's team which won the 2011 ODI World Cup at this same venue. "I was 21-22 at that time and did not realise why the senior players were getting so emotional. After winning this World Cup, I have realised how special this is," said Kohli. He added that he had instantly realised that it was time for him to say goodbye to the format and make way for youngsters.During the Indian team's interaction with Prime Minister Narendra Modi at his residence on July 4, Kohli said, "We lived each ball at the end, we can't explain what was going on inside. We lost hope at one moment, then Hardik took a wicket and then with each ball, we got the energy. I am happy that I was able to contribute to the team in such a big game after a tough time. I won't be able to forget it. I was happy that I was able to take the team to a fighting total."
Article Summary: Lucknow SuperGiants official X, formerly known as Twitter, replied to a post from Tesla CEO and X owner Elon Musk. Musk asked users to share beautiful content. Lucknow Super Giant's social media account replied to the same with a picture from the recent ICC T20 World Cup final, which was played between Indian and South Africa.

Article Title: Vi Business partners with PayU to address payment needs of MSMEs in India
Article Text:
The MSME services offered by Vi Business and PayU include:

Vi Business , the enterprise arm of Vi and PayU have formed a strategic partnership to support MSMEs in India. This collaboration aims to propel MSMEs into their digital journeys by offering bespoke digital payment solutions and addressing their growing needs.The partnership combines Vi Business's digital transformation solutions with PayU‚Äôs expertise in digital payments and financial services .Together, they offer a comprehensive suite of services, including innovative payment solutions, a bespoke offers engine, buy-now-pay-later (BNPL) options, and seamless WhatsApp integration. These services are designed with India's MSMEs at the core.Vi Business, through its ReadyForNext program, also offers an exclusive range of productivity and collaboration digital tools for MSMEs at special prices. These tools include location tracking, Google Workspace, personal cloud storage, and mobile security solutions, assisting MSMEs in managing their digital workplaces, business operations, and customer engagements efficiently.Arvind Nevatia, Chief Enterprise Business Officer, Vodafone Idea, said, "Our partnership with PayU underscores our commitment towards digital enablement of small and medium-sized businesses in India. By combining Vi Business's best-in-class enterprise solutions and PayU‚Äôs expertise in fintech, we aim to accelerate MSMEs growth journey."Anirban Mukherjee, Chief Executive Officer, PayU, added, "At PayU, we believe in the power of digital innovation to transform businesses at a grassroot level. Our partnership with Vi Business is a testament to our commitment to supportingIndian MSMEs in their digital transformation. Together, we are providing a robust suite of business and digital finance solutions designed to increase revenues and boost efficiency, enabling these MSMEs to thrive in today's competitive market."Integrated payment solutions: This includes a seamless payment gateway with zero transaction charges for UPI and RuPay, and reduced rates for domestic debit and credit cards, and net banking.WhatsApp store: Enables businesses to offer a seamless shopping experience within WhatsApp, reducing friction in the checkout process and increasing customer conversion.Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL): Allows MSMEs to receive full payment at the time of purchase while offering customers flexible payment options at reduced transaction charges.Customized offers at checkout: PayU‚Äôs Offer Engine enables MSMEs to create and run promotion campaigns, improving ticket size and driving customer loyalty.Tools for employee productivity and collaboration: Exclusive offers for MSMEs include Google Workspace, location tracking, personal cloud storage, and mobility security, bundled with unlimited calling and data.
Article Summary: Vi Business and PayU have formed a strategic partnership to support MSMEs in India. The partnership combines Vi Business's digital transformation solutions with PayU‚Äôs expertise in digital payments and financial services. They offer a comprehensive suite of services, including innovative payment solutions, a bespoke offers engine, buy-now-pay-later (BNPL) options, and seamless WhatsApp integration.

Article Title: Dyson is cutting 1,000 jobs in the UK, CEO says decision ‚Äúincredibly painful‚Äù
Article Text: Dyson , the British vacuum cleaner and appliance manufacturer, announced plans to cut approximately 1,000 jobs in the UK, representing more than a quarter of its workforce in the country. The move is part of a global restructuring effort aimed at streamlining operations in increasingly competitive markets.The job cuts, revealed to staff on Tuesday morning, will affect Dyson's 3,500-strong UK workforce across its offices in Wiltshire, Bristol, and London.The company, founded by Sir James Dyson in 1991, employs around 15,000 people globally, 10,000 of which are employed in the company's Britain offices.Hanno Kirner , Dyson's CEO , cited fierce competition and the accelerating pace of innovation as reasons for the restructuring. "We have grown quickly and, like all companies, we review our global structures from time to time to ensure we are prepared for the future," Kirner stated, in a statement."Decisions which impact close and talented colleagues are always incredibly painful. Those whose roles are at risk of redundancy as a result of the proposals will be supported through the process," he added further.The decision comes despite Dyson's recent financial success, with the company reporting record revenues of ¬£7.1 billion ($9.1 billion) in 2023, up from ¬£6.5 billion in 2022. However, the company faces increasing pressure from competitors, particularly in Asia.Dyson has promised to support affected employees through the redundancy process. The company did not specify how many roles would be cut worldwide, as reviews are being conducted on a country-by-country basis.
Article Summary: Dyson announced plans to cut approximately 1,000 jobs in the UK, representing more than a quarter of its workforce in the country. The move is part of a global restructuring effort aimed at streamlining operations in increasingly competitive markets. The decision comes despite Dyson's recent financial success, with the company reporting record revenues of $9.1 billion.

Article Title: OnePlus reveals key features of 4 products launching at its Summer Launch Event
Article Text:
OnePlus Nord 4 key features

OnePlus Pad 2 key features

OnePlus Nord Buds 3 Pro key features

OnePlus Watch 2R key features

OnePlus is hosting its Summer Launch Event in Milan on July 16 and the company recently announced the products it will launch at the event. The Chinese tech company has now revealed key details about all of the products: OnePlus Nord 4 smartphone, the OnePlus Pad 2 tablet, the OnePlus Nord Buds 3 Pro and the OnePlus Watch 2R .According to the company, OnePlus Nord 4 ‚Äì the newest member of the OnePlus Nord family ‚Äì will be the slimmest OnePlus Nord ever at 7.99mm.It will also feature a metal unibody design with aluminium back. As per OnePlus, the smartphone has been created using ‚Äúseveral cutting edge techniques including a nano-etched design‚Äù and a new antenna design.OnePlus Pad 2 joins the OnePlus Pad and the OnePlus Pad Go in OnePlus's tablet family. It will feature a 12.1-inch display that has a 7:5 ratio. Rumours suggest that the tablet will come with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC and with two configuration options: 8GB/128GB and 12GB/256GB.OnePlus Nord Buds 3 Pro will be available in two colourways ‚Äî Starry Black and Soft Jade. The TWS earphones will offer up to 49 dB of noise cancellation and an ultra-wide frequency range of up to 4,000Hz. Each earbud will sport a 12.4mm driver and BassWave 2.0 for strong bass.The OnePlus Watch 2R is the follow-up to the OnePlus Watch 2. OnePlus says that the wearable will offer 100-hour battery life, feature dual-frequency GPS and will debut in two colour options..The OnePlus Summer Launch Event will be streamed live on OnePlus's YouTube channel.
Article Summary: OnePlus is hosting its Summer Launch Event in Milan on July 16. The company recently announced the products it will launch at the event. The Chinese tech company has now revealed key details about all of the products. These include the OnePlus Nord 4 smartphone, the OnePlus Pad 2 tablet and the OnePlus Watch 2R.

Article Title: Elon Musk responds to Chinese girl who wants him to fix a bug in Tesla screen: Watch
Article Text: A young Tesla owner in China, Molly, has shared a video message directly addressing Tesla CEO Elon Musk about a bug on her car's touchscreen.In a short video posted on X (formerly known as Twitter), Molly highlighted the issue she is facing with the touchscreen in her Tesla car. When she tries to draw on the touchscreen, previously drawn lines disappear as she adds new ones.With wide eyes and a clear explanation, she asks Mr. Musk to "fix an error" on her Tesla.The video quickly went viral on the X platform (formerly known as Twitter), garnering millions of views and capturing the attention of the Tesla CEO himself. Responding to the video, Musk simply replied "Sure," sparking further conversation online.Shared on X (formerly Twitter), the post quickly gained traction, garnering over a million views and 16,000 likes from users. Many users have also reacted to the video.Here are some of the reactions‚Äúthis is a critical issue @elonmusk please fix it‚Äù‚ÄúOh please this is very concerning @elonmusk ! Help her‚Äù‚Äúhalt all production until we resolve. please and thank you.‚Äù‚ÄúAwww, she‚Äôs so adorable‚Äù
Article Summary: A young Tesla owner in China, Molly, shared a video message directly addressing Tesla CEO Elon Musk about a bug on her car's touchscreen. The video quickly went viral on the X platform (formerly known as Twitter), garnering millions of views and capturing the attention of the Tesla CEO himself.

Article Title: Asus launches India's first CoPilot+ PC, the Vivobook S 15 OLED, with Qualcomm‚Äôs Snapdragon X Elite processor and AI features
Article Text:
Asus Vivobook S 15 OLED with Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite: Price, availability in India

Asus Vivobook S 15 OLED with Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite: Specifications, features, and more

Asus has launched India's first CoPilot+ PC, the Vivobook S 15 OLED, featuring Qualcomm‚Äôs Snapdragon X Elite Processor. Here‚Äôs all you need to know about the Vivobook S 15 OLED.Priced at INR 1,24,990, the Vivobook S 15 OLED is now available on Flipkart, Asus e-shop, and other retail channels.The Vivobook S 15 OLED boasts a 15.6-inch 3K 120Hz Asus Lumina OLED display, offering vibrant visuals with a 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut and VESA DisplayHDR True Black 600 certification.The laptop measures at 1.47cm in thickness and weighs 1.42kg.At the heart of the new laptop is the Qualcomm Snapdragon X Elite Processor with Adreno integrated graphics, complemented by 16GB LPDDR5X RAM and a 1TB PCIe 4.0 SSD. The Snapdragon X Elite processor features Qualcomm‚Äôs Hexagon NPU, promising 45 TOPS of neural processing prowess. The laptop offers up to 18 hours of battery life with 90W USB Type-C fast charging.The Vivobook S 15 OLED comes equipped with a range of connectivity options, including USB4 ports supporting 4K display output and 40 GB/s data transfer.The laptop also features military-grade MIL-STD 810H durability. The VivoBook S15 also incorporates Asus IceCool thermal technology for efficient heat dissipation and Asus Antimicrobial Guard for added hygiene protection. It comes with Windows Hello face recognition supported by a 1080p Full HD 3DNR webcam.
Article Summary: The Vivobook S 15 OLED boasts a 15.6-inch 3K 120Hz Asus Lumina OLED display. The laptop measures at 1.47cm in thickness and weighs 1.42kg. Qualcomm‚Äôs Hexagon NPU promises 45 TOPS of neural processing prowess.

Article Title: Apple releases iOS 18 Developer Beta 3 with Dynamic Wallpaper and other improvements
Article Text: Apple released the third developer beta of iOS 18 to developers on Monday, improving upon the new features that are set to roll out for everybody with stable release later this year.One of the most notable additions in iOS 18 beta 3 is a new dynamic wallpaper that shifts colours based on the time of day. Dark Mode received significant attention in this update, with Apple extending its reach to third-party app icons.For apps with simpler colour schemes, Apple automatically adjusts the icons, while more complex designs receive a darker tint.The Photos app saw a minor but welcome change with the addition of a dedicated "Select" button on the main interface, streamlining the process of choosing multiple images. This update also reorganised the emoji, Memoji, and stickers interface in Messages, combining them into a single, more accessible menu.Other improvements include a refined Flashlight interface with more intuitive controls for adjusting brightness and spread, and an updated RCS toggle in Messages settings that provides additional context about the feature's functionality.The iOS 18 beta is currently available only to registered developers, with a public beta expected to launch later this month. Apple plans to release the final version of iOS 18 to all users this fall, likely in September alongside new iPhone models.As with all beta software, users should expect some performance and stability issues. Apple continues to refine the operating system based on tester feedback, addressing bugs and improving overall functionality with each release.
Article Summary: The iOS 18 beta is currently available only to registered developers, with a public beta expected to launch later this month. Apple plans to release the final version of iOS 18 to all users this fall, likely in September alongside new iPhone models. As with all beta software, users should expect some performance and stability issues.

Article Title: Apple iPhone users, government has a warning on these SMSes
Article Text:
Here‚Äôs what the post reads

New Transnational #Scam Alert:

#iPhone users are receiving scam messages via

iMessage

regarding package from random accounts. Clicking on suspicious links may be avoided and read receipts may be disabled for such suspicious messages.

What does the scam message read?

India Post:

Your package has arrived at the warehouse and we attempted delivery twice but were unable to due to incomplete address information. Please update your address details within 48 hours, otherwise your package will be returned. Please update the address in the link: https://indiapostsz.top/IN

After the update is completed we will re-deliver within 24 hours, India Post!

How to spot a fake scam message?

Apple iPhone users, have you received a message allegedly about an undelivered parcel at India post warehouse? If yes, then be warned. This is a new scam where fraudsters are sending fake messages to iPhone users about packages from random accounts.Cyber Dost ‚Äì the cybersafety and cybersecurity awareness handle maintained by the Ministry of Home Affairs, Government of India has warned Apple users against these new ‚Äò transnational scam ‚Äô messages.It has shared a post on X (formerly Twitter) informing users and advising them not to click on suspicious links in these messages.With some patience and intelligence, it is possible to spot scam messages. In case you receive such a message, look for signs like urgency in taking an action, poor grammar in sentence formation, suspicious links and unusual sender‚Äôs address among others.
Article Summary: Fraudsters are sending fake messages to iPhone users about packages from random accounts. Government of India has warned Apple users against these new ‚Äò transnational scam ‚Äô messages. Look for signs like urgency in taking an action, poor grammar in sentence formation, suspicious links and unusual sender‚Äôs address among others.

Article Title: iQoo Z9 Lite 5G smartphone to launch in India on July 15: Here‚Äôs what the smartphone may offer
Article Text:
iQoo Z9 Lite confirmed details

iQoo Z9 Lite expected specs and price

iQoo is all set to launch its new Z-series smartphone in India. The Chinese smartphone maker iQoo has confirmed that it will launch the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone in the country on July 15.The company posted on X (formerly known as Twitter) about the upcoming iQoo launch. ‚ÄúTaking it slow? - no more! A #FullyLoaded5G experience awaits you! #iQOOZ9Lite,‚Äù reads the post.Along with the launch date, iQoo has also shared a teaser image of the upcoming iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone.The company has confirmed that the yet-to-launch iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone will sport a dual rear camera setup. The smartphone will feature a flat rear panel and display. The dual rear camera is placed inside a rectangular module located at the top left corner.The smartphone maker has also confirmed that the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone will pack an octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset paired with 6GB of RAM. The smartphone will offer 128GB internal storage.iQoo Z9 Lite is said to sport a 6.56-inch HD+ LCD display which is expected to offer up to 90Hz of refresh rate. The smartphone is tipped to sport a 50MP main camera and a 2MP depth sensor.The smartphone is also rumoured to come equipped with a side-mounted fingerprint sensor and house a 5000 mAh battery with 15W fast charging support.Multiple online rumours suggest that the iQoo Z9 Lite may come with a starting price tag of Rs 10,000.
Article Summary: iQoo is all set to launch its new Z-series smartphone in India. The Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed that it will launch the iQoo Z9 Lite smartphone in the country on July 15. The smartphone is tipped to sport a 50MP main camera and a 2MP depth sensor. It is also rumoured to come equipped with a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.

Article Text:

Mukesh Ambani-owned Reliance Jio has announced a price increase for all its prepaid and postpaid plans, effective from today, July 3. The new tariff prices will be implemented across all touchpoints and channels. The most affordable plan, now priced at Rs 189, was previously Rs 155, marking a 22% rise. It's important to note that despite the price hike, the plan benefits such as call minutes and data allowance will remain unchanged.The telecom service provider has announced the price hike for 14 prepaid unlimited plans, 3 data add-on plans and 2 postpaid plans.Here‚Äôs a list of all the plans:The new tariff plans feature various price adjustments for popular monthly, bi-monthly, quarterly, annual, data add-on, and postpaid options. Monthly plans now range from Rs 189 to Rs 449 (increased from Rs 155 to Rs 399). Bi-monthly plans are priced between Rs 579 and Rs 629 for data ranging from 1.5GB/day to 2GB/day over 56 days. Quarterly plans are available from Rs 479 to Rs 1199, offering 6GB to 3GB/day over 84 days. Annual plans range from Rs 1899 to Rs 3599.Note that once the price hike goes into effect, the unlimited 5G data will only be available with plans offering 2GB/day data or above.
Article Summary: Reliance Jio announces price hike for 14 prepaid unlimited plans, 3 data add-on plans and 2 postpaid plans. Monthly plans now range from Rs 189 to Rs 449, with data offerings. Quarterly and annual plans also see adjustments. Telecom service provider ensures unchanged benefits amidst the price hike.

Steps to use Indian Bike Driving 3D Cheat Codes

Begin by starting the Indian Bike Driving 3D game on your device.

Look for the button featuring a phone icon, typically located at the bottom left corner of the game screen. Click on this icon to open the phone menu.

Within the phone menu, find the handset icon, usually coloured green and positioned in the middle. Click on this icon to proceed.

Upon clicking the handset icon, a contact list will appear on the screen. Look for an icon featuring nine orange circles at the bottom left corner of this screen. Click on it to access the number entry interface.

In the number entry interface, use your device's keypad to input one of the provided cheat codes. Each cheat code corresponds to a specific reward mentioned in the description.

Bharti Airtel has announced a price hike across all its prepaid and postpaid plans. Airtel's revised tariff plans will be effective from today, July 3. As announced by the company, it has increased the price of its entry-level plans by 70 paise, 'in order to eliminate any burden on budget challenged consumers.'It must be noted here that while the plans have become costlier, benefits like data, call minutes, etc remain the same.In total, Airtel has increased the price of 15 prepaid and postpaid plans. These prices apply to all circles, including Bharti Hexacom Ltd. Circles. Reliance Jio and Vodafone Idea have also increased their tariff rates by up to 22%.The revised tariff increases the price of Rs 179 monthly plan to Rs 199. The plan will continue to offer 2GB mobile data per day, unlimited calling and 100 SMS per day. Validity of the plan remains 28 days. Similarly, the annual plan of Rs 1,799 offering 2GB mobile data per day, unlimited calling and 100 SMSes every day will now cost Rs 1,999.Airtel's daily data add-on plans now come at Rs 22 onwards (a hike of Rs 3 from the previous Rs 19).Coming to Airtel's postpaid plans, the price now ranges from Rs 449 to Rs 1,199. Daily data plans offering up to 3GB data per day now come with starting price of Rs 265.
Article Summary: Bharti Airtel has increased the price of its monthly plan to Rs 199, offering 2GB data daily, unlimited calling, and 100 SMS per day. The annual plan now costs Rs 1,999 with the same benefits. These changes aim to support budget- constrained consumers while maintaining service quality.

Article Title: Why Anand Mahindra ‚Äòcalled‚Äô ChatGPT after India‚Äôs Cricket World Cup win
Article Text:
Why Anand Mahindra ‚Äòcalled‚Äô ChatGPT

‚ÄúHello Chat GPT 4.O

Please make me a graphic image showing the Indian Cricket team as Superheroes.

Because they were SuperCool till the end.

The greatest gift of this final to India was that it didn‚Äôt come easy. It almost slipped out of their grasp. But they never lost the match in their minds.

Reminding all of us that being a Superhero never comes without a fierce determination to win and a Never Give In attitude.

Jai Ho! #IndiavsSA #T20WorldCupFinal‚Äù reads the post.

Here how users reacted to the post

Team India becomes T20 World Cup 2024 champions

Mahindra Group chairman Anand Mahindra is known for his active social media presence and witty remarks. Following India's dominating victory against South Africa in the T20 World Cup final, Mahindra posted a congratulatory message on X (formerly known as Twitter) with the help of ChatGPT .Mahindra asked ChatGPT 4.0 to create an AI-generated image of the Indian Cricket Team, requesting that the cricketers be depicted as superheroes.Mahindra also shared the ChatGPT-generated image on X. In the image, Team India is depicted as superheroes wearing capes featuring the Indian national flag.Men in Blue secured a thrilling victory in the T20 World Cup 2024 final. After a tense battle against South Africa at the iconic Kensington Oval, India emerged champions with a narrow seven-run win. Virat Kohli's dominant 76 and Rohit Sharma 's sharp captaincy were instrumental in securing the win. Following the game, Virat Kohli also announced his retirement from the T20 format.
Article Summary: Anand Mahindra asked ChatGPT 4.0 to create an AI-generated image of the Indian Cricket Team. In the image, Team India is depicted as superheroes wearing capes featuring the Indian national flag. Men in Blue secured a thrilling victory in the T20 World Cup 2024 final.

Article Title: Shark Tank Judge Anupam Mittal on India semi-final win: Chalo 'yeh bhi' hisaab barabar
Article Text:
Here's what Anupam Mittal wrote on X

How other brands celebrated India's win

India reached the finals of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 with a thumping victory over England by 68 runs. After losing the toss against England, India scored 171/7 in 20 overs at the Guyana National Stadium. The men in blue all out England in just 16.4 overs, limiting them to 103 runs. India will now play the finals against South Africa on June 29 at Barbados.Like other matches, India's victory over England is being celebrated across the country.Shark Tank judge Anupam Mittal shared his joy over India's win via a post on microblogging platform - X, formerly Twitter.In his post, Mittal wrote "1947 me India se nikala aur 2024 me West Indies se,". Adding further, he said "Chalo üá¨üáß2022 ka bhi hisaab barabar üáÆüá≥üèÜ," pointing at 2022 India's loss against England in the 2022 T20 World Cup semi-final ."don't know about english tea, but english tears are delicious üòÇ #INDvENG," food delivery app Zomato wrote in a X post."Just packing ; Revenge order for Semi-Final in 2022 üò§," Walmart-owned Flipkart wrote. ‚ÄúHitman has once again added hope to the cart üôè," the e-commerce company wrote in another post on X.Quick commerce app Blinkit shared an image of billboard that read "Dear England, if you are thirsty, we can deliver a bo'ah of wo'ah in 10 minutes."
Article Summary: India reached the finals of ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 with a thumping victory over England by 68 runs. The men in blue all out England in just 16.4 overs, limiting them to 103 runs. India will now play the finals against South Africa on June 29 at Barbados.

Article Title: Microsoft Xbox server outage fixed, here‚Äôs what the company said
Article Text:
What caused the Xbox outage?

Microsoft has fixed the Xbox Live service outage that impacted users worldwide who were unable to sign into their Xbox accounts. According to the official support page of Xbox, the service is now up and running.The outage, according to Downdetector, started late night on July 2 around 11pm IST and lasted for several hours till morning next day.Xbox started an investigation which lasted for hours.However, the company did not reveal the exact reason of what resulted in the outage, but kept continuously updating users about it.After the service was restored, official handle of Xbox Support on X (formerly Twitter) said ‚ÄúUsers should no longer be encountering issues signing in to Xbox Live and services. Thank you for your patience, game on!‚Äù.As per Downdetector, thousands of Xbox Live users were affected by the outage. The company said that it was ‚Äúaware that some users have been disconnected from Xbox Live. We're investigating! Please follow here and on our status page for updates. http://Xbox.com/status‚Äù.While the status page read ‚ÄúYou may not be able to sign-in to your Xbox profile, may be disconnected while signed in, or have other related problems,‚Äù the notice read. ‚ÄúFeatures that require sign-in like most games, apps and social activity won‚Äôt be available.‚Äù
Article Summary: Microsoft has fixed the Xbox Live service outage that impacted users worldwide. According to the official support page of Xbox, the service is now up and running. The outage, according to Downdetector, started late night on July 2 around 11pm IST.

Article Title: Elon Musk: X user questions company‚Äôs policy on DMs, Elon Musk responds
Article Text:
What the change in policy says

X (formerly) rolled out encryption for direct messages ( DMs ) last year, however, for this to be implemented both the sender and recipient must be verified. An X user recently highlighted a change in company policy, raising privacy concerns. This update essentially contradicts X's previous policy of guaranteeing end-to-end encryption for all user content.As per the screenshot shared by the user, the change in policy allows X to manually review DMs for investigations into reported violations, service misuse and legal or government requests.‚ÄúKeeping you safer in Direct Messages,‚Äù the policy reads.‚ÄúX systems scan shared links and media for spam, abuse, and prohibited content. We also analyze usage patterns to detect suspicious behavior and improve your experience. We may manually review DMs to investigate reported violations and misuse of our service, or to comply with laws or governmental requests. See our Privacy Policy for more details,‚Äù it added.The user asked, ‚ÄúWhat happened to encrypted DMs?‚Äù to which Musk replied, ‚ÄúIt currently works in a clunky way for one to one messages (if you turn it on). We‚Äôre working on making it easy to use and apply to group messages too.‚Äù‚ÄúX audio and video calls are automatically encrypted,‚Äù he added.The user then responded by saying: ‚ÄúUnderstood. Is there a reason why encryption can‚Äôt be turned on by default, without manual user interaction for each party? The way it is designed now results in 99% of messages being unencrypted. X should do better than other messengers. You called out WhatsApp for being unsafe.‚ÄùAnother user questioned Musk‚Äôs ability to understand the question.‚ÄúIs it me or did Elon not understand the question of Kim? Kim was worried about reviewing the DMs by government request.‚Äù
Article Summary: An X user recently highlighted a change in company policy, raising privacy concerns. This update essentially contradicts X's previous policy of guaranteeing end-to-end encryption for all user content. The change in policy allows X to manually review DMs for investigations into reported violations, service misuse and legal or government requests.
